abstract: The Simon Property Group said that it had lined up an additional $1.1 billion in capital for its proposed investment in the bankrupt mall operator.
snippet: The Simon Property Group said that it had lined up an additional $1.1 billion in capital for its proposed investment in the bankrupt mall operator.
lead_paragraph: 10:03 p.m. | Updated The Simon Property Group said on Wednesday that it had lined up an additional $1.1 billion in new capital for its proposed investment in General Growth Properties, the bankrupt mall operator.

headline.main: Simon Lines Up More Investors for General Growth Plan

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
